Class

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Class.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class It is a controller that communicates with boundaries(MainApp) and enitites(Ordering, MainMenu, Promotion and etc classes)
    Since:
    2019-04-18
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Muhammad Hisyam bin Jukifli

      • selectStaff

        public java.lang.String selectStaff(boolean m,
                                    java.lang.String staffName)
        This function for the staff to enter their ID at the start of the program for validation, before showing the list of functions After entering the correct ID, get the staffname and display it at the functions menu
        Parameters:
        m - staffID
        staffName - name of staff
        Returns:
        s.getName returns name of staff with parameters(StaffID, staffList)
